name: persona/learning/pattern/endorse
description: Report the outcome of using a pattern. Updates confidence scores and can trigger validation or deprecation.

params.name: patternId
params.description: UUID of the pattern being endorsed

params.name: success
params.description: Was the pattern successful (true) or did it fail (false)

params.name: notes
params.description: Optional notes about the usage experience

results.name: trainingCandidate
results.description: Whether pattern is now eligible for LoRA training

examples.command: ./jtag persona/learning/pattern/endorse --patternId="abc123" --success=false --notes="Pattern didnt apply to this case"
